data.name: Kalen Chock Presents: Forest
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

In this Tutorial we will be discussing on how to paint a forest in color from scratch. This is going to piggy back on the last video we did where we painted painted a castle in color . Because it is similar in theme a lot of the same concepts and principles should apply. This video is shorter than the previous but we will be discussing how to paint in a more natural manner with minimal layers in this Tutorial you will receive: 1 hr HD Video + Commentary Brushes JPEG Step BY Step PSD Files
data.about_the_game:
In this Tutorial we will be discussing on how to paint a forest in color from scratch. This is going to piggy back on the last video we did where we painted painted a castle in color . Because it is similar in theme a lot of the same concepts and principles should apply.

This video is shorter than the previous but we will be discussing how to paint in a more natural manner with minimal layers in this Tutorial you will receive:

1 hr HD Video + Commentary
Brushes
JPEG Step BY Step
PSD Files
data.short_description: This tutorial is about how to paint a forest in color from scratch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
